title: Which is the better stream after 12th if one is not opting for maths, humanities and physics or chemistry and biology? - Quora

response.answer_text: After 12th ,if you are able to do hard work and do want to work for indian govt. then a best career option you may go for is that NDA(national defence academy) conducted by UPSC twice a year or attend army rally. selection process is writtenthere may be a GD (group discussion)roundmedical test(fitness test)interview
